title: How is BVRIT College? - Quora
tags: Padmasri Dr. B.V. Raju Institute of Technology

response.answer_text: BVRIT (path for enlightment) Founder Chairman - Sri Vishnu Educational Society Padma Bhushan Dr. B.V. Raju The Institute is also duly approved by the AICTE and the Government of Telangana State and is affiliated to JNTU, HYDERABAD. BVRIT is accredited by both NBA and NAAC, New Delhi. The purpose of establishing BVRIT was to provide quality technical education in a perfect ambience for the all-round development of a student. Under the hegemony of our Chairman, Sri K.V.Vishnu Raju, BVRIT made a quantum leap in its reputation for its best teaching learning practices, high quality intake, excellent infrastructure facilities, highest number of placements, etc. Aspiration is the greatest motivator for determination, Being pleasant is the boon, Greenery is actually the grace of the land, Very fortunately we BVRITians are blessed with the above mentioned powerboosters of life. We start very late from the dawn, we stop very early before the dusk ,but we spend the intermediary time “constructively”. We have seminar halls foe collaboration of various thoughts from the students and clubs to encourage them. We have labs not only for implementation but also for innovation. We have grounds to simulate and auditorium to inculcate. Here teaching is neither just confined to class nor to follow the legacy of 1:n(one teacher , n students) Past and upcoming events: International Conference on Research Advancements in Applied Engineering Sciences Computer and Communication Technologies. Annual National Conference “ RAPIDEET” FDP on CLOUD COMPUTING Modeling and simulation of Multiphysics in Engineering by department of chemical engineering Annual day Zealotz Differentiators : BVRIT GOING GREEN ASSISTIVE TECHNOLOGY LAB IBM CENTER OF EXCELLENCE EMERGING TECHNOLOGY CENTER CLUB INQUIZITIVE CLOUD COMPUTING CENTER VISHNU INNOVATION LABS(ECE) BVRIT KNOWLEDGE CENTER CITY CENTER @ HYDERABAD ANJANI POWDER RESEARCH CENTER ENTERPRENEURSHIP DEVELOPMENT CENTER RURAL WOMEN TECHNOLOGY PARK Official Website URL http://bvrit.ac.in/

One of the top colleges in Telangana. The college is very huge, with vast greenery area. The faculty and lab facilities are also great. The college Also encourages sports for sports lovers. Hostel facility is also Good(PS: i was a day scholar). As an alumni, I can tell you that BVRIT encourages new ideas. It wont let you force you need to do this particular job but rather shows you the way to find your dream. But the only downside is that this college is in outskirts of the city(Narsapur). Had this college been located in the city it would be the only college with all the facilities in Hyderabad. At the end of the day, you will realize that you won’t find another college as best as this. BVRIT is one of a kind :)
Yeah it's a good college with lots of facilities and benefits. They have very good placement record too. It's the most memorable experience studying at BVRIT.
